Players can soon outsmart the Warden or Raven in Tide Prison's new special missions and save Ahsarah from the abyss. Reign victorious in the Warden & Raven Special Missions coming to Delta Force on September 23 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, iOS, Android, and PC (Steam).

Take a look at the refinements to the game's UI system, offering an overhauled design for the new title. Football Manager 26 is launching on November 4 for macOS and PC (Steam).

author: IGN
description:
Sister Splinter is one of the bosses you'll have to deal with in order to complete the Threadspun Town mission for Bellhart. The real challenge with this fight is managing the arena, so we think using your powers and projectiles on the extra enemies that spawn is the easiest way to control things. From there, just try to stay away from getting trapped in tight spaces as much as possible.

For more info on Hollow Knight: Silksong, head to our wiki @ https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong

#HollowKnightSilkSong #Gaming #IGN
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Boss Fight - Sister Splinter (Shellwood)

description:

author: IGN
description:
In this boss fight, we go up against the Fourth Chorus boss, which you will run into after acquiring the Drifter's Cloak. There are multiple ways to win this fight as the final part of it involves two gusts of wind becoming available for use. We do use them in this fight, and we also die as we beat the boss as we jump into the explosion. However, take note we do get credit for the win so we did not need to replay the fight.

00:00 - Beginning of fight
02:22 - The wind gusts become available, you can use them to get to the explosive at the top of the arena, or you can continue to just hit the boss in the head like you did up until this point

For more info on Hollow Knight: Silksong, head to our wiki @ https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong

#HollowKnightSilkSong #Gaming #IGN
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Boss Fight - Fourth Chorus (Far Fields)

author: IGN
description:
Beloved art thieves, The Kisugi Sisters, return in a new reimagining of the best-selling manga. Check out the Cat’s Eye trailer for this upcoming anime series. Cat's Eye stars Mikako Komatsu, Ami Koshimizu, Yumiri Hanamori, Takuya Sato, Yoko Higasa, and Katsuyuki Knoishi. The twelve-part series premieres on September 26 on Hulu and Hulu on Disney+.

By day, Hitomi, Rui, and Ai run a cafe, but by night these three sisters work as a team of thieves determined to recover their father’s stolen art collection. Balancing their double lives becomes even more difficult as they are relentlessly investigated by Detective Toshio — who doesn’t know his girlfriend is one of the thieves he’s pursuing.

First created by Tsukasa Hojo, "Cat's Eye" stays true to the original manga while also honoring the '80s anime series. Cat's Eye is directed by Yoshihumi Sueda.

#IGN #Anime
title: Cat’s Eye - Official Trailer (2025) English Subtitles

author: IGN
description:
Borderlands 4 is packed with billions of guns, endless chaos, and a whole lot of mechanics that the game doesn’t exactly explain very well. If you’ve ever wondered why your build feels off, how fishing for loot even works, or why tipping Moxxi is worth your cash, don’t worry – you’re not alone. We’ve rounded up some of the best hidden tips and tricks the game never bothers to tell you.

In this Borderlands 4 guide, we’ll cover 12 things the game doesn’t tell you, including how to respec your character, find red chests, unlock Class Mods, maximize your movement, and even track down a Legendary Vending Machine that sells $1 weapons. Whether you’re a new player just starting your Vault Hunter journey or a series veteran looking to min-max your build, this video has all the Borderlands 4 tips, tricks, and secrets you need to get the most out of your time on Kairos.

#IGN #Gaming #Borderlands4
title: 12 Things Borderlands 4 DOESN'T Tell You

author: IGN
description:
Leave Monday's in the dust. The highly anticipated Kart racer of the year is finally here and it's your one way ticket to the fast lane. That's right, Garfield Kart 2: All You Can Drift has released on all platforms. So pack up last night's left over lasagna and hit the roads with the rest of the Garfield characters to earn yourself some street cred in this high octane kart racer that's sure to keep you on the edge of your plate, one lap at a time.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Garfield Kart 2: All You Can Drift - The First 11 Minutes of Gameplay

description:

Knights of the Fall tells the story of Haru, a combat veteran, and Yoshida, his scientist sidekick, who join forces to uncover how interdimensional travel and the afterlife could be connected, using time and gravity-bending technology. Knights of the Fall will be available on PC.

description: Watch the Cinematic Launch Trailer for Borderlands 4, the latest installment in the first-person looter shooter franchise developed by Gearbox. Explore a brand-new planet of Kairos with Vex, Rafa, Amon, and Harlowe as Vault Hunters in a war against the Timekeeper. Make use of billions of weapons, dangerous enemies, and a whole lot of loot. Borderlands 4 is launching on September 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC, with a release on Nintendo Switch 2 on October 3.
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Cinematic Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Cast n Chill gets a new update. Watch the Cast n Chill: Autumnwood Lake update trailer for this cozy idle fishing game where you explore serene lakes, rivers, and oceans. Catch rare fish, upgrade your gear and reel in legendary catches - with your loyal pup by your side. The Cast n Chill: Autumnwood Lake trailer showcases gorgeous autumn colors, as the update brings the Autumnwood Lake area. In this new update, swing by Rusty’s Bait n’ Tackle to grab the Autumnwood Fishing License, and you’ll unlock goodies. Cast n Chill's Autumnwood Lake update is available now on PC via Steam.
title: Cast n Chill: Autumnwood Lake - Official Launch Trailer

description:
Dead Reset is available now on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch. Watch the terrifying Dead Reset launch trailer for this blood-soaked interactive horror, where each death brings you closer to the truth. Trapped in a terrifying death-loop, surgeon Cole Mason is kidnapped and brought to an underwater facility, forced to operate on a patient to extract an evolving parasitic horror.

author: IGN
description:
Borderlands 4 wastes no time throwing you headfirst into its chaotic open world, and while that’s half the fun, it can also feel a little overwhelming at first. Don’t worry – we’ve put together nine quick tips to help you hit the ground running, score some sweet loot, and start feeling like a true Vault Hunter in no time.

In this video, we’ll cover the best things to do first in Borderlands 4, from choosing the right Vault Hunter and unlocking the Digirunner, to upgrading your SDUs, fishing for loot, and making the most of your jetpack. Whether you’re new to the Borderlands series or a longtime fan, these early-game tips, tricks, and strategies will set you up for success. If you’re searching for Borderlands 4 tips, a beginner’s guide, early game advice, or essential things to do first, you’re in the right place.

00:00 Intro
00:25 Read Character Affinities
01:10 Get the Digirunner ASAP
02:05 Fishing Spots
02:52 Prioritize Upgrading Your SDU
03:58 Pay Attention to Alt Fire
04:46 Use
title: Borderlands 4 – 9 Things You NEED To Do First

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Ayasa: Shadows of Silence trailer for this upcoming surreal narrative platformer adventure game. Follow Ayasa, a girl traversing fractured lands where Love, Faith, and Hope clash with Greed, Betrayal, and Indifference. Each surreal realm embodies a moral force—both light and shadow—challenging players to decide whether Ayasa’s path will lead to redemption and balance, or a fall into tyranny. Ayasa: Shadows of Silence will be available on PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store on September 25, 2025.

#IGN #gaming
title: Ayasa: Shadows of Silence - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
A new Borderlands means a new burning question: which class should you play? Since each vault hunter has three action skills, each of which has a skill tree, there’s a pretty wide variety in terms of playstyles within each character. After some time with the final game, here’s our breakdown of each vault hunter so you can decide who is best for you in Borderlands 4.

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from Beyond Episode 911, Max, Brian, and Jada discuss 5 games releasing this fall that we've waited 10+ years for. While some of these games have taken longer to get a proper sequel (The last time we had a Skate release was the same year as the iPhone 4, Red Dead Redemption, and the PlayStation Move) others have taken a much needed break. Which game are you looking forward to playing this fall? Beyond! 

00:00 - Skate
03:17 - Ninja Gaiden 4
06:10 - Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2
09:13 - Silent Hill f
12:27 - Once Upon a Katamari

This weeks show is Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Brian Altano, and is produced by Nick Maillet
title: 5 Fall Video Games We've Waited 10+ Years To Play - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Borderlands 4 reviewed by Travis Northup on PC. Also available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S.

"Borderlands 4 is a badass open-world evolution of a wonderfully unhinged looter-shooter series that needed to try something new, and it largely nails the biggest swings it takes. Combat is slicker than ever thanks to exciting new movement options and some interesting enemy designs, and the entertaining story takes things in a fresh direction while still tying neatly into existing lore. The transition to an open world isn’t the smoothest, especially when troubling terrain with a few too many invisible walls can make it feel like these environments are all for show, but that’s more than worth putting up with in exchange for being able to chart your own path and freely explore the wacky, violent world of Kairos. The bugs my crew and I encountered were bad enough to occasionally sour our co-op groove, but in between them we had a great time, and my friends and I have found ourselves utte
title: Borderlands 4 Review

author: IGN
description:
